title: WBF approach for ensemble
description: How to make stable ensemble in object detectionHi everyone! My name is Alex Shonenkov, I am DL/NLP/CV/TS research engineer. Especially I am in Love with NLP & DL. Today I would like to share with you, my friends, super easy technique for bbox postprocessing and making ensemble in object detection tasks. I spied this idea from really good russian competitions grandmaster Roman Solovyev ZFTurbo in this repository that I used in this kernel as dataset. original paper: Weighted Boxes Fusion: ensembling boxes for object detection models
